summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 MERCEDES-BENZ METRIS. WHETHER STATIONARY OR DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE PASSENGER SIDE MIRROR WAS TOO WIDE AND OBSTRUCTED THE CONTACT'S VIEW OF ONCOMING TRAFFIC. MERCEDES-BENZ OF FORT MYERS IN FORT MYERS, FLORIDA REFERRED THE CONTACT TO THE MANUFACTURER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE VIA A VOICEMAIL FROM THE CONTACT. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 30,000.
